ValidationRule.description: Prevent user from populating Send Survey when one of the Add-on Ancillary fields is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( (Stand_alone_Flex_HR__c = true) || (Stand_alone_TAA__c = true) ), ISCHANGED(Send_Survey__c), (Send_Survey__c = true), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot send a Survey for an Add-On service.
